Package projektet

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
projektet.GameBoard
public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameBoard()
    Creates a new empty GameBoard object.
    GameBoard​(int[][] board)
    Creates a new GameBoard object, containing copying the layout of board.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int[][] getBoard()
    Returns a matrix of the GameBoard

    Finds all numbers in the row with the specified coloummn
    int[][] getRegion​(int row, int coloumn)
    Returns the region in which (row, coloumn) is located
    int[] getRow​(int row)
    Finds all numbers in the row with the specified row

    Returns the value of (row, coloumn)
    void removeNumber​(int row, int coloumn)
    Sets the value of (row, coloumn) to -1 (empty).
    void setNumber​(int i, int row, int coloumn)
    Sets the value of the box at row and coloumn to i.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard()
      Creates a new empty GameBoard object. Empty spaces are filled with -1.

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard​(int[][] board)
      Creates a new GameBoard object, containing copying the layout of board. Notice: will not fill empty spaces
      Parameters:
      board - describing a Sudoku board

  • Method Details

    • setNumber

      public void setNumber​(int i, int row, int coloumn) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the value of the box at row and coloumn to i.
      Parameters:
      i - value to be inserted
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • removeNumber

      public void removeNumber​(int row, int coloumn) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the value of (row, coloumn) to -1 (empty).
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • getValue

      public int getValue​(int row, int coloumn) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the value of (row, coloumn)
      Returns:
      The value, or -1 if empty
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • getRegion

      public int[][] getRegion​(int row, int coloumn) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the region in which (row, coloumn) is located
      Returns:
      The region of the specified coordinate as a 3x3 Integer matrix
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • getRow

      public int[] getRow​(int row)
      Finds all numbers in the row with the specified row
      Parameters:
      Row -
      Returns:
      Integer array of the whole row

    • getColoumn

      public int[] getColoumn​(int coloumn)
      Finds all numbers in the row with the specified coloummn
      Parameters:
      Coloumn -
      Returns:
      Integer array of the whole coloumn

    • getBoard

      public int[][] getBoard()
      Returns a matrix of the GameBoard
      Returns:
      int[][] of the board
